STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: The Ultimate Cat vs. Mouse Showdown
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_FOOTER_TEXT_1: © 2023 Cat vs Mouse Brawl. All rights reserved.
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Experience the ultimate cat and mouse showdown in this action-packed fighting game. Choose your side, master your moves, and claw your way to victory!
FEATURE_1_BODY: Engage in intense, whisker-to-whisker combat with dynamic cat and mouse characters. Experience the ultimate test of feline and rodent reflexes!
FEATURE_2_BODY: Choose from a diverse roster of cats and mice, each with unique abilities and fighting styles. From nimble house cats to cheese-powered mice, there's a fighter for everyone!
FEATURE_3_BODY: Battle across a variety of environments, from cozy living rooms to bustling city alleys. Each arena offers strategic advantages for both cats and mice.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Challenge friends or foes online in thrilling multiplayer matches. Climb the global leaderboards and prove you're the top cat or the mightiest mouse!
FEATURE_5_BODY: Master intricate combos and special moves in the comprehensive training mode. Hone your cat-like reflexes or mouse-like agility to outsmart your opponents.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Personalize your fighters with a wide range of costumes, accessories, and victory poses. Show off your unique style as you claw your way to the top!
HERO_TEXT_BEFORE_TITLE: Get ready for the ultimate showdown
HERO_TITLE: Claw & Paw: The Epic Cat vs Mouse Battle
HERO_SUBTITLE: Dive into a thrilling world of feline vs rodent combat where strategy meets chaos
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Ready to pounce into action? Let's get you started on your cat and mouse adventure!
CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_FIELD_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Any Special Abilities? (Ninja Pounce, Sonic Squeak, etc.)
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Whiskers & Tails is an exciting cat and mouse fighting game where players can choose to be either a cunning feline or a clever rodent in epic battles of wit and agility.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How do I play as a cat or mouse?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: When starting a game, you can select your preferred character - cat or mouse. Each has unique abilities and playstyles. Cats are stronger but slower, while mice are quick and can squeeze into tight spaces.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes! We offer various modes including 1v1 duels, team battles, and a story mode where you can progress through a series of challenging levels as either a cat or mouse.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Absolutely! You can personalize your cat or mouse with a wide range of skins, outfits, and accessories. Some are unlockable through gameplay, while others are available for purchase in our in-game store.
CTA_TITLE: Unleash the Ultimate Feline vs. Rodent Showdown!
CTA_BODY: Enter a world where cats and mice engage in epic battles. Sharpen your claws, perfect your scurrying, and prepare for the most thrilling pet combat game ever!
CTA_SUBTITLE: Choose Your Side: Furry Feline or Clever Mouse
CTA_CONTENT_SUBTITLE: Experience intense rivalries, cunning strategies, and whisker-to-whisker action in this addictive cat and mouse fighting game!
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our cat and mouse brawler
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our game is an action-packed fighting game where you can play as either a cat or a mouse, battling it out in various environments. It's a unique twist on the classic rivalry!
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: What platforms is the game available on?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: The game is currently available on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox. We're working on a Nintendo Switch version to be released in the near future.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes! We offer single-player story mode, local multiplayer, online multiplayer, and a tournament mode for competitive players.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How many characters can I choose from?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: At launch, there are 10 playable characters - 5 cats and 5 mice. Each has unique abilities and fighting styles. We plan to add more characters through future updates.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is there a way to customize my character?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Absolutely! You can unlock various skins, outfits, and accessories for your characters by progressing through the game or purchasing them from our in-game store.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Engage in thrilling cat vs. mouse showdowns across various exciting arenas.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Choose from a diverse roster of feline and rodent fighters, each with special abilities.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Challenge friends or compete online in intense 1v1 or team-based matches.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: © 2023 Feline Frenzy Games. All rights reserved. May the best paw win!
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Stay Clawed In: Get the Latest Whiskers & Tails News!
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from the cats and mice who've experienced the thrill of the chase
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This game is purr-fect! I've never had so much fun chasing mice and showing off my feline fighting skills. It's addictive!
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a mouse, I thought I'd always be on the losing end, but the balanced gameplay gives us a fighting chance. It's a-maze-ing!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The graphics are fur-nomenal, and the multiplayer mode lets me battle with friends. It's the cat's meow!
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: Disorient feline foes with explosive catnip
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: Entice and trap cats with irresistible cheese
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_4: Soar above the battlefield with feline agility
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Lash out at opponents with lightning speed
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Enter the arena where cats and mice clash in epic combat. Will you be the hunter or the hunted?
